CustomField.description: Defines if, when Invoices are emailed that have been created using this Invoice Setting, the Expense Claim Files/Attachments are included on the email
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if, when Invoices are emailed that have been created using this Invoice Setting, the Expense Claim Files/Attachments are included on the email
CustomField.label: Exp Claim Attachments with Invoice
